```{r}
library(ggnet)
library(ggplot2)
library(sna)
library(network)
```

```{r}
net<-rgraph(10,mode="graph",tprob=0.5)
net=network(net,directed=F)
network.vertex.names(net)=LETTERS[1:10]
ggnet2(net)
```

```{r}
net%v%"cat"=iflese(LETTERS[1:10])%in%c("A","E","I"),"vowel","consonant")
ggnet(net, color="cat")
```

```{r}
ggnet2(net,size="cat")
```

```{r}
ggnet2(net,size.palette=c("vowel"=10,"consonant"=12)
```

```{r}
ggnet2(net,size="cat",palette="Set1",label=T)
```

```{r}
ggnet2(net,size="cat",palette="Set1",label=T)
```

```{r}
library(networkD3)
data<-data.frame(from=c("A","A","B","D","C","D","E","B","C","D","K","A","M"),
                 TO=c("B","E","F","A","C","A","B","Z","A","C","A","B","K"))
simpleNetwork(data)
```
